00019 #include <iostream>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 
00022 template <class T>
00023 CPoint2D<T>::CPoint2D()
00024 {
00025         // default constructor
00026         m_x=0;
00027         m_y=0;
00028 }
00029 
00030 template <class T>
00031 CPoint2D<T>::CPoint2D(T x,T y)
00032 {
00033         // constr. with init.
00034         m_x=x;
00035         m_y=y;
00036 }

00048 {
00049         // copy constructor
00050         *this=P2D;
00051 }

00053 template <class T>
00054 CPoint2D<T>::~CPoint2D()
00055 {
00056         //destructor
00057 }
00058 
00059 template <class T>
00060 void CPoint2D<T>::Print() const
00061 {
00062         // prints value of point to cout
00063         std::cout << "point=(" << m_x << "," << m_y << ")" << std::endl;
00064 }
